Welcome to VMI Bootcamp II!¶

Organized by the Vanderbilt Microbiome Initiative (VMI) and funded by Vanderbilt University Trans-Institutional Programs (TIPs).

This is an introduction to 16S rDNA microbiome analyses using QIIME 2.

Contents:

  • Microbiome Introduction
    • Learning Goals
    • The Human Gut Microbiome
    • 16S Ribosomal DNA and Phylogenetic Markers
  • Command Line Tutorial
    • Learning Goals
    • What is the terminal?
    • Basic Commands
  • Python Scripts
